snippet: An apparent execution by rebel fighters of pro-government militiamen drew criticism amid claims of new massacres by government forces.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Hwaida Saad and Dalal Mawad from Beirut, Alan Cowell from London, an employee of The New York Times from Aleppo, Syria, and Rick Gladstone from New York.

lead_paragraph: An apparent execution by rebel fighters of pro-government militiamen drew criticism amid claims of new massacres by government forces.

headline.main: Syrian Fighting Intensifies in Battle for Aleppo
headline.print_headline: Syrian Fighting Intensifies in Battle for Aleppo

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
